EmailTemplate.name: SW: Known SW Match Unapproved
EmailTemplate.subject: SW: Known SW Match Not Approved by Staffing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
The SW that {!Contact.Name} previously knew has not been approved by Staffing. Staffing are now seeking a new match.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a SW who was previously known to a YP has not been approved by staffing.
